ProjectTitle: Drawing Lines: Unveiling the Scholarly Potential of Visual Storytelling
InitialFeedbackHistory: 14/03/2025 - [REDACTED] storage and backup: [REDACTED] mention OneDrive as a storage solution for your research data. [REDACTED] no longer recommend OneDrive for this purpose for a number of reasons, chief among which the fact that, because your OneDrive account is connected to your KU [REDACTED] employment, your data is deleted as soon as you leave the university for any reason. [REDACTED] other words, data stored on OneDrive cannot be accessed by the university itself, which goes against KU [REDACTED] RDM [REDACTED] [REDACTED] find a different storage solution, we recommend you use the ICTS [REDACTED] [REDACTED] (at https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en). [REDACTED] drives (which you also mention) are a good alternative. - [REDACTED] issues: [REDACTED] sure to submit the PRET application before the data collection phase.
